p: Adult male Swiss mice and Wistar rats, weighing around 25 and 300 g, respectively, were randomly housed in appropriate cages at 24 ± 2 °C on a 12 h light cycle with free access to food (Purina, São Paulo, Brazil). All procedures in this study were carried out in accordance with Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (CEEA-UFPI and CEPA-UFPB, Brazil).
